title.speech: The Journey into the Trench: A CD Adventure by Arthur Beck.

start.speech: The year is 2078. Humans have spread almost everywhere in the solar system that they can, and among the few remaining places is the bottom of the mariana trench. You are among the crew of the expedition to find what's down there . . . You are currently in the expedition vessel. The above ground team captain is shouting down at you, asking if you're ready.
